question.para: Where can I post a question about this module?

answer.para: Sent an email to sr-users@lists.sip-router.org or,
Remember: first at all, check if your question was already answered on one of SER mailing lists:

question.para: How can I report a bug?

answer.para: Accumulate as much as possible information (SER version, ser -V output, your OS (uname -a), SER logs, network dumps, core dump files, configuration file) and send a mail to support@voice-system.ro
